
.. _env create_ref:

conda env create
=======================

.. raw:: html

   <PRE>
   <!-- Manpage converted by man2html 3.0.1 -->
   <B>CONDA(1)</B>                         User Commands                        <B>CONDA(1)</B>
   
   
   
   NAME
          conda - conda env create
   
   DESCRIPTION
          usage: conda-env create [-h] [-f FILE] [-n NAME] [-q] [--json]
   
                 [remote_definition]
   
          Create an environment based on an environment file
   
      positional arguments:
          remote_definition
                 remote environment definition
   
      optional arguments:
          -h, --help
                 show this help message and exit
   
          -f FILE, --file FILE
                 environment definition file (default: environment.yml)
   
          -n NAME, --name NAME
                 environment definition
   
          -q, --quiet
   
          --json
                 Report all output as json. Suitable for using conda programmati‚Äê
                 cally.
   
      examples:
                 conda env create conda env  create  -n  name  conda  env  create
                 vader/deathstar conda env create -f=/path/to/environment.yml
   
   
   
   Continuum Analytics                June 2015                          <B>CONDA(1)</B>
   </PRE>
